work.summary: Technical project manager for a team of researchers researching technologies for the next generation mobile systems, focusing on the implementation of Massive MIMO antenna systems. Project included circa 20 highly skilled PhD's and MSc's, and resulted in several patent applications.
highlights: 5G Research project with regular contacts with HQ in Shanghai, China

work.summary: Markus was in charge of development for CronLab Ltd’s web filtering services, which was used by companies and schools troughout Europe. The system was also built into other manufacturers’ products, e.g., the Android tablet Kurio, targeted to children, where CronLab’s filtering services limits web access. Markus was also managing all aspects of the Swedish subsidiary, being the only Director located in Sweden.
highlights: The filtering service currently has over 1,000,000 users worldwide
Office manager, recruited and managed developers and sales staff

education.summary: Markus graduated first in his class, 6 months ahead of time. The Master Thesis was a prototype for publishing digital camera photos to a cloud service. It was made as a product evaluation for AXIS Communications in Lund.

awards.title: Project Manager Professional
awards.summary: Certified Project Manager Professional by the Project Management Institute

interests.name: Home Automation
interests.summary: Using home automation to monitor and control the family's country house

interests.name: Politics and Society
interests.summary: Enjoy participating in debates on economy, politics and our society.

references.name: Michael Wallenius, CEO CronLab Ltd
references.reference: Markus is an extremely sharp and intelligent person with a broad competence ranging from technology to starting a business. On the social side he shares his elegant humor to all around him when there is time for fun. As an entrepreneurial CTO he has been one of the best I've ever met.
